attributes.action: remove the WHIP SYSTEM & allow FREE VOTE on all bills brought before the parliament to become law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current system that allows the 3 line whip forces backbench MPs to back ill thought out, half-baked proposals, often rushed through parliament to the detriment of the people. Lobbying combined with reliance on few large donor companies for party funding & the resultant conflict of interest is sustained by the Whip system. The whip system - a top down approach - is outdated and is contrary to the true spirit of democracy that is in touch with grass-root sentiments

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
